content: अंगारः --रं [अंग्-आरन् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 134</ls>] {@--1@} Charcoal (whether heated or not); घृतकुंभसमा नारी तप्तांगारसमः पुमान्; उष्णो दहति चांगारः शीतः कृष्णायते करं <ls>H. 1. 80</ls>; त्वया स्वहस्तेनांगाराः कर्षिताः <ls>Pt. 1</ls> you have ruined yourself with your own hands; <ab>cf.</ab> “to dig a mine under one's feet”; कुरुकुलांगार <ls>Ve. 6</ls> destroyer or pest of the Kuru family. {@--2@} The planet Mars. {@--3@} A plant हितावली, °कुष्टकः हितावली. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a prince who fought with king Māndhātṛ. --र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Red, of a red colour. --रं Red colour.

अंगारः --रं [अंग्-आरन् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 134</ls>] {@--1@} Charcoal (whether heated or not); घृतकुंभसमा नारी तप्तांगारसमः पुमान्; उष्णो दहति चांगारः शीतः कृष्णायते करं <ls>H. 1. 80</ls>; त्वया स्वहस्तेनांगाराः कर्षिताः <ls>Pt. 1</ls> you have ruined yourself with your own hands; <ab>cf.</ab> “to dig a mine under one's feet”; कुरुकुलांगार <ls>Ve. 6</ls> destroyer or pest of the Kuru family. {@--2@} The planet Mars. {@--3@} A plant हितावली, °कुष्टकः हितावली. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a prince who fought with king Māndhātṛ. --र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Red, of a red colour. --रं Red colour.
